name: PROSIC
body:
PROSIC is a caller for somatic insertions and deletions. Using a latent variable model, it enables to assess the significance of somatic variants in terms of posterior probabilities.

For installation and usage, see the [README](https://github.com/PROSIC/prosic2).

# Authors

* Original model: [Louis Dijkstra](https://github.com/louisdijkstra)
* Extended model and implementation: [Johannes Köster](https://johanneskoester.bitbucket.org)
* Supervision: [Alexander Schönhuth](http://homepages.cwi.nl/~as)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
